programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Which Side
programme.desc: Aji and Mamat, two members from different village head candidate camps, are fighting for the votes of Kusno, an old man who is known to be honest and difficult to bribe in his village. To get Kusno's vote, they must find Jamal who is missing.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Jealousy
programme.desc: Inspector Bruhl is investigating the abduction of a young boy from a playground, until evidence suggests that the boy doesn’t exist at all. Is he a figment of the alleged mother’s fractured reality, or are answers buried in her traumatic past?

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Av é
programme.desc: While hitchhiking from Sofia to Ruse, Kamen meets Avé, a 17-year-old runaway girl. A compulsive liar, Avé keeps inventing new identities and backstories, which threaten to get Kamen deeper and deeper into trouble.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: Murder In Herault
programme.desc: There’s a double homicide – a boss of a nightclub is found murdered while a campsite manager is discovered with a fox mask on her corpse. Just as the police discover a startling link between the murders, a new corpse wearing a wolf mask surfaces.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Seeing Thunder
programme.desc: Seeing Thunder is a documentary that threads on the hidden conundrums in the deaf world. Within the deaf and the hearing world is a fine line – so what’s it like to live within as an in-betweener?

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Stars In Style S8 - EP 10
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Five classically-trained baking teams return to the kitchen to solve two more culinary crimes, including an elimination bake with a seasonal dessert of Yolanda's choosing; the team with the poorest performance is sent home after the elimination bake.

programme.title: Songbird
programme.desc: In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 901
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Supa Strikas - EP 48
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Rise - EP 22
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Legendary Blader Valt Aoi has been training the next generation of elite Bladers at Spain's BC Sol. One day, rookie Bladers Dante Koryu and Delta Zakuro witness Valt unleashing his newly evolved Gamma Bey, Sword Valtryek. To their surprise, Valtryek radiates a golden light as it rockets around the stadium. Inspired by the limitless possibilities of this "Hyper-Flux" state, both Dante and Delta seek the same bond with their Beys.

programme.title: Saving Me - EP 14
programme.desc: A super genius billionaire goes back in time to teach his 11-year-old self to be a better person.

programme.title: Cocomelon - EP 57
programme.desc: Learn letters, numbers, animal sounds and more with JJ in this musical series that brings fun times with nursery rhymes for the whole family!

programme.title: Cocomelon - EP 61
programme.desc: Learn letters, numbers, animal sounds and more with JJ in this musical series that brings fun times with nursery rhymes for the whole family!

programme.title: Pinkfong Sing-Along Movie 2: Wonderstar Concert

programme.title: JoJo and GranGran: Sr2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A delightful and heartwarming animated series celebrating the special relationship between an inquisitive girl and her fun and active grandmother.Join JoJo and Gran Gran in their bustling London neighbourhood as they find joy in the everyday - whether it's going on a bike ride, visiting the dentist, or creating a Caribbean-style carnival for their friends.JoJo adores spending time with her energetic Gran Gran, who is always ready with a Gran Gran Plan' when JoJo comes to visit.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8 - EP 3

programme.title: Wildlife Snap! With Biogirl MJ - EP 12
programme.desc: Biogirl MJ steps into Hampstead Wetlands Park, a hidden oasis of serenity! What secretive wildlife will she encounter among the lush greenery?

programme.title: Lil Wild Specials S3 - EP 3

programme.desc: Taking on Ratcatcher’s army of beasts turns out to be a piece of cake for the Suicide Squad.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: Murder In Herault
programme.desc: There’s a double homicide – a boss of a nightclub is found murdered while a campsite manager is discovered with a fox mask on her corpse. Just as the police discover a startling link between the murders, a new corpse wearing a wolf mask surfaces.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Seeing Thunder
programme.desc: Seeing Thunder is a documentary that threads on the hidden conundrums in the deaf world. Within the deaf and the hearing world is a fine line – so what’s it like to live within as an in-betweener?

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: Surro
programme.desc: A surrogate mother wants to meet the child she once carried but is hindered by a valid written agreement.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.
